title: Quarterly average daily rate of hotels in New York 2016 to 2017
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Quarters on X-axis for 2 groups 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Average daily rate in USD.
Over the 4 Quarters, the Average daily rate in USD for 2017 have been climbed whereas reduced for 2016.
Out of all 2 groups, 2016 had the highest Average daily rate in USD for Quarter Q4 and 2017 had the lowest Average daily rate in USD for Quarter Q4.
The maximum Average daily rate in USD for 2017 that was found in Quarter Q1 was 0 times larger than the minimum Average daily rate in USD observed in Quarter Q4.

Over the 4 Quarters, the Average daily rate in USD for 2017 have been climbed whereas reduced for 2016.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Quarters on X-axis for 2 groups 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Average daily rate in USD.
Over the 4 Quarters, the Average daily rate in USD for 2017 have been climbed whereas reduced for 2016.
Quarter Q4 had the maximum Average daily rate in USD among all 2 groups, and it was for 2016. The minimum Average daily rate in USD was observed in Quarter Q4 for 2017.
For Quarter Q1, 2017 had the maximum Average daily rate in USD and it saw the lowest in Quarter Q4 out of all 4 Quarters.
The maximum Average daily rate in USD for 2017 that was found in Quarter Q1 was 0 times larger than the minimum Average daily rate in USD observed in Quarter Q4.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Average daily rate in USD was found in case of 2016.
Averaging all 2 groups 2016, and 2017, the Quarter Q1 is the maximum Average daily rate in USD and Q3 is the minimum Average daily rate in USD.
